gov.fnal.ppd.dd.chat

Class MessageCarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.chat.MessageCarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageCarrier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server. When talking from a Java Client to a Java Server, it is a lot easier to stream Java objects, so that is what we do here. Taken from the internet on 5/12/2014. @see
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
